milestones.title: Build Foundational Skills in AI
milestones.description: Develop a strong understanding of AI principles and core techniques.
steps: Complete an introductory course on AI and machine learning.
Experiment with basic AI algorithms using Python.

milestones.title: Deep Dive into Machine Learning
milestones.description: Gain deeper knowledge of machine learning algorithms and frameworks.
steps: Master key machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Work on small projects to apply machine learning algorithms in practice.

milestones.title: Enhance Software Engineering Skills
milestones.description: Strengthen software engineering capabilities with a focus on AI applications.
steps: Study software engineering best practices relevant to AI development.
Collaborate on an open-source AI project to gain practical experience.

milestones.title: Develop Real-World AI Projects
milestones.description: Implement AI solutions in real-world scenarios.
steps: Identify a problem that can be solved with AI and develop a solution.
Participate in AI hackathons or contests to challenge your skills.

milestones.title: Build a Professional Network
milestones.description: Expand your connections in the AI industry.
steps: Engage with AI communities and forums online.

milestones.title: Seek Career Opportunities
milestones.description: Position yourself for AI Software Engineer roles.
steps: Update your resume and portfolio with AI projects.
Apply for AI Software Engineer positions at companies that match your desired work environment.
